title: There Is Nothin' Like a Tune
description: Todd S. Purdum talks about “Something Wonderful: Rodgers and Hammerstein’s Broadway Revolution,” and Fran Leadon discusses “Broadway: A History of New York City in Thirteen Miles.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
